Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum led the scoring with 33 points, and also contributed with nine assists and eight rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics' victory against the Timberwolves marked the beginning of a four-game road trip, providing a much-needed boost after struggling with an 8-6 record in December
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics faced challenges against the Oklahoma City Thunder, where they suffered a 105-92 loss due to a lackluster second-half performance
Others: Jaylen Brown and Kristaps Porzingis were absent for the Celtics in the game against the Minnesota Timberwolves
